description:
Ace pilot James leads an attempt to destroy the alien base. Elsewhere, Billy uncovers an extra-terrestrial mind control plot, and Penny searches for clues about Element X.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Erbitterte Schlacht: Lüftet das Geheimnis um Element X!
Extreme Offense, Extreme Defense Solving the Mystery of Element X!
Kyokugen no Koubou! Element X no Nazo o Toke!
Крайняя обида, максимальная защита. Разгадка тайны элемента X
極限の攻防! エレメントXの謎を解け!
